languages.text: "Ваши отвага и прямолинейность восхищают, {mf|господин|госпожа}! Долой Чорда!"

traits.locale_text: "Ваша дерзость и прямолинейность достойны уважения, {mf|господин|госпожа}! Последую вашему примеру и присоединюсь — долой Чорда!"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "Your courage and forthrightness are admirable, my {mf|lord|lady}! Down with Chorda!"
languages.original_text: "Ваши отвага и прямолинейность восхищают, {mf|господин|госпожа}! Долой Чорда!"

languages.text: “你的勇气和直率真令人钦佩，大人！让库尔达滚得远远的！”
languages.original_text: "Your courage and forthrightness are admirable, my {mf|lord|lady}! Down with Chorda!"

traits.locale_text: “你的勇气和直率真令人钦佩，大人！让库尔达滚得远远的！”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: 「陛下の勇気と率直な姿勢は実に素晴らしいものですよ！チョーダを倒しましょう！」
languages.original_text: "Your courage and forthrightness are admirable, my {mf|lord|lady}! Down with Chorda!"

traits.locale_text: 「陛下の勇気と率直な姿勢は実に素晴らしいものですよ！チョーダを倒しましょう！」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: «¡Su valentía y su franqueza son admirables, mi{mf|lord|lady}! ¡Abajo con Chorda!».
languages.original_text: "Your courage and forthrightness are admirable, my {mf|lord|lady}! Down with Chorda!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Su valentía y su franqueza son admirables, mi{mf|lord|lady}! ¡Abajo con Chorda!».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "Euer Mut und Eure Offenheit sind bewundernswert, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft! Nieder mit Chorda!"
languages.original_text: "Your courage and forthrightness are admirable, my {mf|lord|lady}! Down with Chorda!"

traits.locale_text: "Euer Mut und Eure Offenheit sind bewundernswert, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft! Nieder mit Chorda!"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: « Je trouve votre courage et votre franchise admirables, {mf|mon seigneur|ma dame} ! Mort à Chorda ! »
languages.original_text: "Your courage and forthrightness are admirable, my {mf|lord|lady}! Down with Chorda!"

traits.locale_text: « Je trouve votre courage et votre franchise admirables, {mf|mon seigneur|ma dame} ! Mort à Chorda ! »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "Cesaretiniz ve dobralığınız takdire şayan {mf|lordum|leydim}! Chorda belasını bulsun!"
languages.original_text: "Your courage and forthrightness are admirable, my {mf|lord|lady}! Down with Chorda!"

traits.locale_text: "Cesaretiniz ve dobralığınız takdire şayan {mf|lordum|leydim}! Chorda belasını bulsun!"
